reviews.review: I've played on Xbox and PC.  Overall super fun game to just hop on every once in a while as killer or to play with some friends

It's definitely a fun game for what it advertises. If you're a casual gamer who doesn't really look too much into stuff (hitboxes, broken perks, op killers) and just looking for a good time this game can be worth it. Especially if you have a group of friends you're looking to mess around with, it an definitely be a really good time.
game is amazing amazsing fun super good buy for sure

I would recommend this game. I enjoy it a lot, I haven't played in a while but I love the new updates to the game and overall the graphics are amazing and the game play is awesome. I wish there was more free survivors and killers though, apart from that, I love the game. Highly recommend.

Un juego entretenido, y lo que lo hace tan asimÃ©trico, la capacidad de desarrollar y proponer nuevos trucos, dinamismo y un ambiente atractivo.
Cabe seÃ±alar de inmediato que no hay equilibrio en este juego, y dudo que pueda serlo en tales juegos. Los supervivientes que han aprendido a jugar tienen una ventaja colosal: no tienen miedo, no pierden el tiempo, pueden encender fÃ¡cilmente todos los generadores en un par de minutos y simplemente abandonar el mapa. Todo. Los survas pueden huir muy facil :)

I, for one, have had ENOUGH of this game. Extremely overpowered perks such as Visionary and Detective's Hunch remain in the game, while perks like Pop Goes The Weasel and Barbecue & Chilli are left without the buffs they desperately need. I cannot in good faith recommend this game to anyone until they address these issues.
Very nice game, it may have some things that people don't like and it will probably take a while until you get the hang of it, but it's quite worth it. :)
